Book Appointment
Who

We are a traditional barbershop

We are not “Great”, “Fantastic”, “Super”, or “Sporty”. Nor are we trying to reinvent the barbershop by being a men’s spa and/or salon.

It is our goal to remind you of going to the barbershop with your brother, dad, grandpa or uncles when you were a kid. If we achieve that, then we have accomplished our most important goal.

Why

Our Mission Statement

It is our desire to create a welcoming environment that fosters community. We believe that conversation is king, music is its queen and that haircuts allow us to do this. Cutting hair is NOT the most important thing we do. We want women to always feel welcome and never quite comfortable.

Each of us hope you have a favorite barber, and even better if they work here. Kids and Dogs are allowed to be kids and dogs. If that is a problem, then this is not the place for you. If it gets really busy, we will crank the volume of the music. If the music is too loud to speak, it means we are having a great day.

What

Our Services

All barbers are 1099 contractors. We are all encouraged to build our own clientele. As such, not every barber offers the same services and not every barber charges the same for their services. That being said, here are the baselines.

Regular Haircut

$30

 

First Responders

$25

 

Senior Haircut

$20

Fixed income is the key here

Kids Cut

$20

12 and under

Hot Lather Shave

$40

 

Beard Trims

$10

Could be more if razor work is involved
